name: Dan's Big Adventure
description:
Dan's Big Adventure is an MSX-styled platformer that I made in a few days for Mr Scotsman's Vintage Emporium Jam on itch.io.

I don't normally make games at all, but this was a fun thing to do for me.

I hope that you get some amount of enjoyment from this game.

----CONTROLS----

Arrow Keys - Move

Down - Drop through semi-solid platforms

Z - Jump

1, 2, 3, 4 - Change the window size

F5 - Restart the game

ESC - Quit the game
